extendedInfo.description: Unusually holidays calendar is an application which inform you what holiday is today. The database contains more than 200 Polish festivals and more than 1,500 international holidays. Every day you will find new information. The application also includes a widget that shows actual holiday and the sum of today's feast. You can add it in both Polish and international version. Example of holidays: - 5 august - Internation Beer Day - 16 august - Gozan no Okuribi - 29 september - International Coffee Day

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Finally, I have an event to raise my glass to everyday without feeling the guilt of being an alcoholic :-)  Would love to see more remote-island-community-unheard-of-holidays here, looking forward to updated contents!!!
reviews.author: A Google User
